about_the_game:
If you lose someone dear you go to the end of the world to find conciliation. Especially if it is someone who shares your dream. The dream to find an answer to the ultimate question: to whom belongs this mysterious Voice that vibrates through all the living?

Enelia belongs to Za'ani race, who have special organs on their palms that allow them to interact with the environment. Those who are able to use them skillfully become druids.

Enelia has dreamed of becoming a druid since childhood, but she has no talent for it. In order to fulfill her dream she must defy the established Za'ani traditions.

On the way to her goal, she learns a terrible secret that jeopardizes her own life as well as the lives of her loved ones. In search of salvation, Enelia ventures into an uncharted world with unique natural phenomenas, mythical creatures, ancient secrets, and members of a dark cult.

The question is: are you ready for the journey that might lead you to the end of the world?



- Astral vision - ability to look beyond the physical world.
- Opportunity to build relationships with different characters (both romantic and friendly)
- Choices really matter - players will have more than 5 different endings + secret one
- Parallel narrative branches - you'll play as different characters as you progress through the game
- Additional gameplay activities in the form of meeting mythical creatures, solving mysteries of the world and finding hidden paths.
- Cinematic experience with cut scenes and comic frames.




Dive into magical world of Za'ani where there are no sun, no moon and no skies - only endless labyrinths, dark forests and gigantic caves.







Friendship or enmity, love or hate - make your own decisions







You will be able to make choices, choices that will lead you towards either awareness or madness.






Enjoy dozens of activities and puzzles.







The world is full of riddles and mysteries. And those who are observant will be rewarded.







Enelia - is a not about adventure only, but also about destiny, love and determination. You may experience tragedy, you may experience wonder, but most importantly you may experience horror.







Journey will guide you through various mind-blowing areas of the world that is yet to be discovered.







Mythiriums and Sey'lims are the ones who rule the world. Will they be your friends or your enemies?

name: Enelia Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.90 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: mac and linux support later
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In a world corrupted by Madness a young druid Enelia uncovers a horrifying truth that threatens her life. To save herself and her loved ones, Enelia defies public order and embarks on a journey where she meets various characters, solves mysteries and makes fateful choices.
